Review Text: Great place to have a pint and watch the boats go by. Food is really good too and moderately priced for Amsterdam standards. Nicest Bacon Baguette in the city here. Cooked to perfection and is a generous size. Perfect for the morning after!

Review Text: Cozy pub, food looked delicious, drinks were just right and prompt. I can't help but make a stop here every time I'm in town as it's a good location and they usually have football on TV. Name: Aran Irish Pub

Review Text: The quintessential of Amsterdam since the 2000s: 7 euros a pint, unfriendly staff that act like they‚Äôre the customers, no creativity.
